markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tenacious Toxins](/Feats.aspx?ID=5776) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 65 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=71) (Level 6), [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=259) (Level 6)

</column>

---

Your victims tend to expire long before your poisons, since the latter have been specifically formulated to last longer. The maximum duration of any poison you create increases by an amount equal to the poison's stage 1 interval, to a maximum of twice the poison's maximum duration.
name: Tenacious Toxins

summary_markdown: Your victims tend to expire long before your poisons, since the latter have been specifically formulated to last longer.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 4" pfs="Standard" > Tenacious Toxins Source Player Core 2 pg. 65 1.1 Archetypes Poisoner (Level 6), Poisoner (Level 6) --- Your victims tend to expire long before your poisons, since the latter have been specifically formulated to last longer. The maximum duration of any poison you create increases by an amount equal to the poison's stage 1 interval, to a maximum of twice the poison's maximum duration.
